wanderingMiniBosses:BossBurn.NAME: Burn
wanderingMiniBosses:BossBurn.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, NL draw a card. NL You take !M! more damage. NL Exhaust.

wanderingMiniBosses:FinaleOfPromise.NAME: Finale of Promise
wanderingMiniBosses:FinaleOfPromise.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Choose !M! cards in your discard pile that cost X or less and play copies of them. NL Exhaust.
wanderingMiniBosses:FinaleOfPromise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 HP. NL Choose !M! cards in your discard pile that cost X + 1 or less and play copies of them. NL Exhaust.
